item.description: The Church St @ Lexington St (layover) bus stop is temporarily closed due to construction. Beginning Monday, April 14, 2014, the Church Street @ Lexington Street stop is temporarily closed due to construction. Customers should please travel west, turn right at Lexington Street, and travel north to the nearest accessible location on Lexington Street @ Church Street. 09/11/2014 10:26 PM
Bus stop at Western Ave @ Green St (outbound) moved to 17-21 Western Ave. Affected routes: 64-6 07/30/2014 11:47 PM

7am-3pm: Route 131 (inbound) detoured due to construction & bypasses Porter St @Garfield Rd. Connect at Porter St @Orient Ave & Porter St @Norman Rd. Affected direction: Inbound
Affected stops: Porter St @ Garfield Rd 07/30/2014 11:47 PM

item.title: Fitchburg/South Acton Line
item.description: Fitchburg Line service suspended between North Station and Fitchburg on Saturdays and Sundays through November 23 due to track improvements. No substitute buses provided. Affected stops: North Station Porter Square Station Belmont Waverley Waltham Brandeis/ Roberts Kendal Green Hastings Silver Hill Lincoln Concord West Concord South Acton Littleton / Rte 495 Ayer Shirley North Leominster Fitchburg 09/26/2014 11:19 AM

item.title: Red Line
item.description:
Buses replacing Red Line service between JFK/UMass and Broadway Stations October 4-5 and October 18-19 Due to the Columbia Junction Signal Replacement Project, buses will replace Red Line trains between JFK/UMass and Broadway Stations in both directions from start to end of service during the following weekends:
- Saturday, October 4, 2014, through Sunday, October 5, 2014 - Saturday, October 18, 2014, through Sunday, October 19, 2014
Regular Red Line train service will resume at the start of service on Mondays. All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities.
Shuttling the following stops: Broadway Station Andrew Station JFK/UMass Station 10/03/2014 07:16 AM

item.title: Red Line
item.description:
Buses replacing Red Line service between Park Street and Kendall/MIT Stations on October 11 from start to end of service. Due to work performed by MassHighway contractors for the Longfellow Bridge Project, buses will replace Red Line trains between Park Street and Kendall/MIT Stations in both directions from start to end of service on Saturday, October 11, 2014. Regular Red Line train service will resume at the start of service on Sunday, October 12, 2014. All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities.
Shuttling the following stops: Kendall/MIT Charles/MGH Park Street 10/01/2014 09:59 AM

item.title: Orange Line
item.description:
Buses replacing Orange Line service between Sullivan and Oak Grove Stations on October 7, 14, 20, and 27 from approximately 8:45 p.m. through the end of service. Due to the Assembly Station Project, alternate shuttle buses will replace Orange Line trains in both directions from Sullivan to Oak Grove Stations beginning at approximately 8:45 p.m. through the end of service on the following days:
- Tuesday, October 7, 2014 - Tuesday, October 14, 2014 - Monday, October 20, 2014 - Monday, October 27, 2014
Regular Orange Line trains will resume at the start of service the next day. All shuttle bus stops are accessible for persons with disabilities.
Shuttling the following stops: Oak Grove Station Malden Center Station Wellington Station Assembly Station Sullivan Station 09/18/2014 01:24 PM
Escalator 504 PORTER SQUARE - Lobby to Mass Ave unavailable due to maintenance 09/24/2014 05:26 AM

Route 554 (outbound) detoured beginning Thursday, September 25, 2014, due to construction on the Beaver Street Culvert. Due to construction on the Beaver Street Culvert (between Waverly Oaks Road and Warren Street), there will be no outbound service on Beaver Street, Warren Street, Belmont Street, or Lexington Street between Waverly Oaks Road and Waverly Square. Inbound service will run normal routing.
Outbound connections for the Route 554 that travels straight on Beaver Street can be made at Beaver Street and Waverly Oaks Road or at Waverly Square.
Connections for the Route 554 (t) OUTBOUND that travels Forest Street to Trapelo Road can be made on Trapelo Road opposite Briarwood Road or at Waverly Square. 10/02/2014 06:16 AM

item.title: 30, 34, 34E, 35, 36, 37, 37/38, 38
item.description:
Routes 30, 34, 34E, 35, 36, 37, and 38 detoured from 12 p.m. to 4 p.m. on Sunday, October 5, 2014, due to a special event. Due to the West Roxbury 5K Road Race/Roslindale Day Parade on Sunday, October 5, 2014, from 12 p.m. to 4 p.m., Routes 30, 34, 34E, 35, 36, 37 and 38 will be detoured.
Route 30 There will be no service to Roslindale Square and Washington Street between South Street and Cummins Highway or Cummings Highway between Roslindale Square and Hyde Park Avenue. Inbound connections can be made at Cummins Highway and Hyde Park Avenue or Washington and Firth Streets. Outbound connections can be made at Washington and South Streets or Cummins Highway and American Legion Highway.
Routes 34/34E There will be no inbound service to Washington Street from Poplar Street to Forest Hills Station. Connect at Washington and Poplar Streets or at Forest Hills. There will be no outbound service to Washington Street between Forest Hills and Roslindale Square. Connect at Forest Hills or Washington and Albano Streets.
Routes 35/36 There will be no inbound service to Belgrade Avenue or Roslindale Square. Connect at Belgrade Avenue and West Roxbury Parkway or Forest Hills. There will be no outbound service to Roslindale Square, Belgrade Avenue, or Washington Street. Connect at Forest Hills or West Roxbury Parkway and Belgrade Avenue.
Routes 37/38 There will be no inbound service to Belgrade Avenue. Connect at Centre and Park Streets or Centre and Weld Streets. There will be no outbound service to Belgrade Avenue or Centre Street between Holy Name and Corey Street. Connect at Centre Street and Buchanan Road or Centre and Corey Streets. 10/02/2014 06:50 AM

Routes 80, 87, 88, 89, 94, and 96 detoured from 8:45 AM to 10:15 AM on Sat Oct 4 due to special event Somerville Homeless Coalition Davis Sq 5K Saturday, Oct 4, 2014
Route 80 IB and OB Connections can be made at Powerhouse Circle and Medford and Main Streets. No service on Broadway between Medford St and Powderhouse Circle. Connections made at Powderhouse and Warner, Broadway and Medford St
Route 87 IB and OB connections made at Elm and Porter Sq or Beech and Orchard No service to Elm St between Beech and Davis Sq, No service on Holland, Teele Sq or Broadway
Route 88 IB and OB Connections made at Highland and Cedar. No service to Highland Ave between Cedar and Davis Sq, No Service to Holland Ave, Teele Sq or Broadway
Route 89 IB and OB No service on Broadway between Medford St and Powderhouse Circle. Connections made at Powderhouse and Warner, Broadway and Medford St or Clarendon Hill
Route 94 IB and OB connections at Powderhouse circle. No Service to College Ave between Powderhouse Circle and Davis Sq, Elm St or Davis Sq
Route 96 IB and OB no service to Beech St, Elm St, Davis Sq Station, College Ave between Davis Sq and Boston St, no Service to Boston St between College Ave and Winthrop St. Inbound connections made at Winthrop and Orchard or Porter Sq Station, Mass Ave OB Connections made at Porter Sq Station or Winthrop and Chester. 09/30/2014 12:49 AM

Route 69 detoured from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m. on Sunday, October 5, 2014, due to a special event. Due to the East Cambridge Rib Festival on Sunday, October 5, 2014, from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m., there will be no service on Cambridge Street between Fulkerson Street and Sixth Street.
Inbound connections can be made at Cambridge Street and Cardinal Medeiros Avenue or Cambridge Street and Fifth Street.
Outbound connections can be made at Cambridge Street and Fifth Street or Cambridge Street and Lambert Street. 10/02/2014 06:20 AM

Elevator 909 NORTH STATION - Lobby to Valenti Way is unavailable on Wednesday, October 8, 2014, due to maintenance. If exiting, travel along the Green Line platform to reach the main station lobby. Once there, pass through the fare gates. Turn right to use North Station Elevator 912 (lobby to Causeway Street) located adjacent to the fare gates. Alternatively, continue down the commuter rail hallway to reach North Station Elevator 941 (lobby to commuter rail and Boston Garden). If boarding, travel one-tenth of a mile down Canal or Beverly Streets to the North Station entrances on Causeway Street. 10/01/2014 09:29 AM

Elevator 910 NORTH STATION - Lobby to the inbound Green Line as well as the Forest Hills-bound Orange Line platforms is unavailable on Thursday, October 9, 2014, due to maintenance. If exiting, exit the train to Haymarket Station and return to North Station on an Oak Grove- (Orange Line) or Lechmere-/North Station- (Green Line) bound train. Alternatively, customers may exit at Haymarket, cross New Chardon Street, and travel three-tenths of a mile down Canal Street to North Station at Causeway Street. 10/01/2014 09:49 AM

Elevator 859 TUFTS - Forest Hills-bound platform to the lobby is unavailable from Monday, October 6, 2014, through Tuesday, October 7, 2014 due to maintenance. A shuttle will be provided between Tufts Medical Center and Back Bay Stations. If exiting, exit the Orange Line at Back Bay and see station personnel or use the call box to request the shuttle. If boarding, see station personnel or use the call box at Tufts Medical Center to request the shuttle. 10/01/2014 12:56 PM

Elevator 933 COMMUNITY COLLEGE - Lobby to the Orange Line platform is unavailable on Friday, October 10, 2014, due to maintenance. A shuttle will operate between Community College and North Station. If exiting, exit the Orange Line at North Station and see station personnel or use the call box to request the shuttle. If boarding, see station personnel or use the call box at Community College to request the shuttle. 10/01/2014 12:57 PM

Routes 424, 450, 455 and 459 detoured due to construction Affected direction: Inbound
Affected stops: Western Ave @ MBTA Lynn Garage Western Ave @ opp MBTA Lynn Garage Connections can be made at Western Ave @ Burns St 10/03/2014 07:23 AM
Route 459 experiencing minor delays due to traffic. 10/03/2014 08:24 AM
